Title: Study and watch heroes and their behavior. The power of the people's war is strong
Designer: "Study and watch heroes and their behavior" Workers' Spare Time Art Creation Group ("学英雄见行动"工人业余美术创作组)Chen Shoukai (陈守凯)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Guo Jianguang (郭建光), the main character of the model opera Shajiabang (沙家浜).
